Posts.EditableText: I am an American teaching English in Beijing now.  Our biggest struggle now in the midst of the Corona virus is dealing with boredom.  I started looking for creative ways to help students with their English that would also be fun - especially since we are all confined to our own houses.  I have skimmed through more than 50 of the games listed here as educational and did not find anything suitable.  Do you know of any games that were designed for this purpose?  Also, on the more advanced games, statistics can be kept on each player.  Is this a beginning designer skill, and intermediate or an advanced?  Can more than one person play a game at a time?
